item.description: 上传下载 前提 已设置好配置项：系统配置、认证配置、主机配置 说明 以\（Windows）或/（Linux）结尾代表文件夹 上传时，local可以是文件或文件夹，remote默认是文件夹 下载时，remote可以是文件或文件夹，local默认是文件夹 上传 将本地节点上的内容上传至远端目标主机组的每个主机上 文件： $ xsh.exe -mode copy -group alpha02 -direction upload -local D:\tmp\LICENSE -remote /tmp/xyz [192.168.165.37 ] --------------------------------------------------------- D:\tmp\LICENSE -> /tmp/xyz/LICENSE :OK [192.168.170.109 ] --------------------------------------------------------- D:\tmp\LICENSE -> /tmp/xyz/LICENSE :OK 文件夹： $ xsh.exe -mode copy -group alpha02 -direction upload -local D:\tmp\ -remote /tmp/xyz1 [192.168.170.109 ] --------------------------------------------------------- D:\tmp\LICENSE -> /tmp/xyz1/LICENSE :OK D:\tmp\hello -> /tmp/xyz1/hello :OK D:\tmp\hello\README.md -> /tmp/xyz1/hello/README.md :OK [192.

加解密 前提 已设置好配置项：系统配置、认证配置、主机配置 已设置系统配置项crypt 加密 $ xsh.exe -mode crypt -plain hello hello -> d436838303eab251c32d5622e92160ad40a4f64328 解密 $ xsh.exe -mode crypt -cipher d436838303eab251c32d5622e92160ad40a4f64328 d436838303eab251c32d5622e92160ad40a4f64328 -> hello

任务编排 前提 已设置好配置项：系统配置、认证配置、主机配置 说明 name: show info actions: - name: show mem and disk group: alpha02 steps: - type: command commands: - free -h - df -h - name: show user info group: alpha03 steps: - type: command commands: - id 在alpha02上查看内存和磁盘信息 在alpha03上查看用户信息 执行 $ xsh.exe -mode task -task example\show-info.yaml [show info ] +++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++ [alpha02: show mem and disk ] ======================================= [192.168.165.37 ] --------------------------------------------------------- total used free shared buff/cache available Mem: 7.

带变量的任务 前提 已设置好配置项：系统配置、认证配置、主机配置 说明 name: add new user actions: - name: add user and set passwd group: alpha03 steps: - type: command commands: - useradd -m {{.alpha.test.username}} - echo {{.alpha.test.passwd}} | passwd --stdin {{.alpha.test.username}} - id {{.alpha.test.username}} 变量采用text/template语法 alpha: test: username: hello3 passwd: Tst@1qaz 变量单独定义文件 执行 $ xsh.exe -mode task -task example\add-user\add-user.yaml -value example\add-user\user-info.yaml [add new user ] +++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++ [alpha03: add user and set passwd ] ======================================= [192.

上传下载 前提 已设置好配置项：系统配置、认证配置、主机配置 已切换到目标主机组环境 以group=alpha02为例 切换上下文 命令：:copy [alpha02:do]# :copy [alpha02:copy]# 上传 将本地节点上的内容上传至远端目标主机组的每个主机上 用法：local -> remote 约束： local和remote必须是全路径，例如：D:\tmp\LICENSE（Windows）或/tmp/abc（Linux） local可以是文件或文件夹，以\（Windows）或/（Linux）结尾代表文件夹 remote必须是文件夹，如果不存在将自动在远端新建文件夹 文件： [alpha02:copy]# D:\tmp\LICENSE -> /tmp/abc .. [192.168.165.37 ] --------------------------------------------------------- D:\tmp\LICENSE -> /tmp/abc/LICENSE :OK [192.168.170.109 ] --------------------------------------------------------- D:\tmp\LICENSE -> /tmp/abc/LICENSE :OK # find /tmp/abc /tmp/abc /tmp/abc/LICENSE 文件夹： [alpha02:copy]# D:\tmp\ -> /tmp/abc1 .. [192.168.170.109 ] --------------------------------------------------------- D:\tmp\LICENSE -> /tmp/abc1/LICENSE :OK D:\tmp\hello -> /tmp/abc1/hello :OK D:\tmp\hello\README.md -> /tmp/abc1/hello/README.

切换环境 前提 已设置好配置项：系统配置、认证配置、主机配置 切换环境 切换至目标主机组 查看主机组列表： 命令：:show group [alpha01:do]# :show group - alpha-123 - alpha01 - alpha02 切换至目标主机组： 命令：:set group=xxx xxx，主机配置项中的主机组名称 [alpha01:do]# :set group=alpha02 [alpha02:do]# 切换至目标主机地址 查看当前主机组主机地址列表： 命令：:show address [alpha02:do]# :show address - 192.168.165.37 - 192.168.170.109 切换至目标主机地址： 命令：:set address=x.x.x.x x.x.x.x，当前主机组中某一个主机地址 [alpha02:do]# :set address=192.168.165.37 [alpha@192.168.165.37:do]# 切换上下文 支持的上下文列表 :do，以配置的用户身份，登录目标主机，执行命令 :sudo，以配置的用户身份，登录目标主机，执行su切换用户，执行命令 :copy，进入上传下载模式，->代表上传，<-代表下载 [alpha02:do]# :do [alpha02:do]# :sudo [alpha02:sudo]# :copy [alpha02:copy]# :do [alpha02:do]#
构建 git clone https://github.com/xied5531/xsh.git cd xsh go build 软件包 Windows：xsh.exe Linux：xsh

系统配置 timeout: action_timeout_s: 3600 command_timeout_s: 300 copy_timeout_s: 600 dial_timeout_s: 10 command: port: 22 ciphers: - aes128-ctr - aes192-ctr - aes256-ctr - aes128-gcm@openssh.com - arcfour256 - arcfour128 - aes128-cbc - 3des-cbc - aes192-cbc - aes256-cbc pty: term: width: 80 height: 60 ispeed: 14400 ospeed: 14400 interval_ms: 100 copy: sftp_max_package_size: 32768 override: false skip: false cache: expiration_s: 900 cleanup_interval_s: 10 ticker_interval_s: 10 crypt: type: key: output: type: text progress: false concurrency: 20 common_commands: - cat - cd - cp - df - awk - date - du - chown - chmod - curl - dos2unix - echo - find - free - grep - hostname - ifconfig - kill - ln - ls - man - mkdir - mount - mv - openssl - ping - ps - pwd - rpm - sed - scp - tar - umask - uname - unzip - zip - uptime - wget - which - who - whoami black_command_regexps: - ^\s*(vi|vim)\s+ - ^\s*top\s*$ - ^\s*expect\s*$ - ^\s*more\s*$ - ^\s*less\s*$ - ^\s*tailf\s*$ - ^\s*tail\s*\-f\s*$ command_sep: ; issue_url: https://github.
